message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I think you'll love it, and I'm confident it will be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $25000. Is this something you'd like to consider?

Thank you for considering my interest in the product. I appreciate the value you're offering, but based on my budget and assessment of the product's worth to me, I would like to propose a price of $15000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm now offering it to you for $22000. I think this is a great value, and I'm confident you'll love the product.

I understand your position, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must respectfully decline your latest offer. I am still unable to meet at your proposed price point. I would like to counter with an offer of $18000. This price reflects what I believe to be a fair valuation given my needs and the product's characteristics.

I understand that we're still a bit apart on the price, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good return on my investment. I'm now offering the product to you for $20000. This is a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Based on my assessment of the product's value to me, I would like to counter with an offer of $19000. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad we're able to continue the negotiation. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm now offering the product to you for $21000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value. Let me know if this is something you'd like to consider.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I've carefully considered your proposal and I believe we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. I would like to counter with an offer of $20000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise while also staying within my budget constraints.

I'm glad we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession to try to reach an agreement. I'm now offering the product to you for $22500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's a great value considering the product's worth. If this isn't acceptable, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I've taken into account all the negotiations and I believe we can come to a conclusion that suits both parties. I would like to counter with an offer of $22000. I hope this will be acceptable for you.
